title: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez | Trump Ramps Up Campaign as Mueller Report Looms: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump ramping up his re-election campaign as the specter of Robert Mueller’s report looms over him.

Then, Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez talks about congressional hearings, being an object of obsession for Fox News and interacting with her colleagues across the aisle.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
